short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a useful tool designed to help programmers stay up-to-date with various coding competitions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Coding Contest Calendar" Chrome extension is a useful tool designed to help programmers and coding enthusiasts stay up-to-date with various coding competitions and contests happening online. 
This extension provides a convenient way to keep track of upcoming coding challenges, hackathons, and coding competitions across different platforms and websites. By installing the extension, users can receive notifications, reminders, and access to detailed information about each contest, including start and end dates, registration links, and contest descriptions. 
This extension is particularly helpful for individuals who want to test their coding skills, engage with the programming community, and participate in competitive coding events.
